00088 struct ElementLink{
00089   int             target_proc;
00090   int             new_proc;
00091   unsigned        elkey[KEYLENGTH]; 
00092   unsigned        targetkey[KEYLENGTH];
00093 
00094   ElementLink*    pre;
00095   ElementLink*    next;
00096   
00097   ElementLink(unsigned* keyi,unsigned* key2, int tp, int np)
00098     {
00099       target_proc = tp;
00100       new_proc    = np;
00101       int i;
00102       for(i=0;i<KEYLENGTH; i++)
00103         {
00104           elkey[i] = *(keyi+i);
00105           targetkey[i]= *(key2+i);
00106         }
00107       next   = NULL;
00108       pre    = NULL;
00109     }
00110   ElementLink(){
00111     next   = NULL;
00112     pre    = NULL;
00113   }
00114   ~ElementLink(){
00115     if(next)
00116       next->pre = pre;
00117     if(pre)
00118       pre->next = next;
00119   }
00120 
00121 
00122 };
00123 
00124 typedef ElementLink* ELinkPtr;
